data.description: Field experiences that promote bilingualism-biculturalism and content area learning in K-12 schools; review of pedagogies and methodologies that support bi/multilingual pupils; application of effective pedagogies, methodologies, and instructional practices; taught in Spanish.
data.title: BILINGUAL-BICULTURAL EDUCATION PRACTICUM

data.description: Study of pedagogies, frameworks, and methodologies appropriate for bilingual-bicultural education; review of contemporary scholarship about rigorous, responsive, and effective practices with K-12 bilingual learners; review of Spanish and English language standards and bilingual standards-based teaching and learning; taught in Spanish.
data.title: BILINGUALISM AND BILITERACY IN SCHOOLS
